scripts.app:clipitabi:update: cp hardhat/artifacts/contracts/ClipIt.sol/ClipIt.json app/src/lib/contracts/ClipIt/ && cp hardhat/typechain/ClipIt.d.ts app/src/lib/contracts/ClipIt/ && cp hardhat/typechain/commons.ts app/src/lib/contracts/ClipIt/
scripts.app:auctionabi:update: cp hardhat/artifacts/contracts/AuctionHouse.sol/AuctionHouse.json app/src/lib/contracts/AuctionHouse && cp hardhat/typechain/AuctionHouse.d.ts app/src/lib/contracts/AuctionHouse/&& cp hardhat/typechain/commons.ts app/src/lib/contracts/AuctionHouse/
scripts.subgraph:abis:update: yarn run subgraph:clipit:abi:update && yarn run subgraph:market:abi:update && yarn run subgraph:auction:abi:update
